Well, to also be fair, Sona's only got 4 skins at current that are more than model changes. These are Arcade, DJ, Sweetheart, and Odyssey. Also, Sona's base rigging and her older skins are simply atrocious in terms of how poorly they've aged. The rigging part applies to every skin except DJ, and because of this awful rigging, it makes her skins seem much older than they actually are, even newer ones.

To also also be fair, Sona is one of the very few champions who already owns an ultimate skin, so I kinda understand why people might prefer to serve other champions with high quality skins first over her. ^^

For example, Quinn still doesn't have a single skin above 975 RP.

Odyssey had great particles and effects to it, but the base model was super ugly and the colour scheme to it just didn't work for me. Luckily a couple of her chromas help fix the palette issues I had, but no chroma took away the hideous shoulder pads they decided to give her.

Sona also doesn't have a single skin that changes her voice lines. Even her ultimate skin just uses a bunch of nonsense chants with a really bad filter over them. I get it, she's a mute hurr durr, but champions like Leona get double 1820 skins, and all Sona gets after two and a half years of waiting (since a 975 skin) is crappy Odyssey.

If they're bringing back the line this year, like they *heavily* implied they would, Sona fits the line better than any other champion, except perhaps Annie and Zoe. Plus there's room for five.

10000000000000% agree.  Odyssey Sona was a such a disappointment (In my opinion). The chromas really did save it except for those damn shoulder pads and her dress. I would also love some new Sona voice lines and legs...

Except they're not the exact same lines as her classic at all? 
And there's not even a 'bad' filter over the 'voice lines' because that's not what they are? 
She just speaks incomprehensible chants that go along with each DJ form. 

I always find it odd how there are these people who allegedly play these champs and miss out on really obvious stuff?

I don't use DJ much at all, I use Sweetheart & other seasonal skins, and either way it just sounds like shit. I want a skin where she can actually have real voicelines, not incoherent lines with a terrible distorted filter.

Seriously, Star Guardian Sona is one of the skins I want the absolute most for Sona. I don't really like to be this kind of person but to wait two and a half years and have her next skin be Odyssey was a serious letdown
There's no shame in being disappointed by Odyssey. It sucked, and they didn't listen to any of her fans' feedback.
I wouldn't say that it sucked, maybe it just wasn't your taste. I actually like the Odyssey Sona skin quite alot and would have bought it if I wouldn't already have DJ Sona.

Yeah, that's fair, I wouldn't say it sucked either. It's a decent skin, but a huge disappointment. The colour scheme without any chromas is ugly, the shoulder pads are way too bulky, and overall it's just a worse version of her DJ skin.
